items.title: Texas flooding updates: Death toll rises to 24 in 'extraordinary catastrophe'
items.description: At least 24 people have died after heavy rain pounded Kerr County, Texas, early Friday, leading to "catastrophic" flooding, the sheriff said.

items.title: Trump signs divisive spending bill during White House military picnic
items.description: President Donald Trump celebrated the Fourth of July by signing his massive spending bill that narrowly passed in Congress this week.
